pull.title: qt: 24.0rc2 translations update
pull.body: This PR pulls the recent translations from the [Transifex.com](https://www.transifex.com/bitcoin/bitcoin) using the [`bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools/update-translations.py`](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools/blob/main/update-translations.py) tool, and it is supposed to be merged just before `v24.0rc2` tagging.

events.body:
Going to keep this PR continuously updated.

cc @fanquake @jarolrod @luke-jr @wtogami

Went through the french diff, mostly good and nothing insane. some things, like errors, are probably not worth translating: it's awkward and not understandable to user anyways, it's just supposed to be pasted in a bug report i guess? (And if translated it will be harder to debug for those treating the bug report)

@darosior 

> Went through the french diff, mostly good and nothing insane. some things, like errors, are probably not worth translating: it's awkward and not understandable to user anyways, it's just supposed to be pasted in a bug report i guess? (And if translated it will be harder to debug for those treating the bug report)

This PR just pulls translations from Transifex website using a script (no manual interaction). To amend or discuss particular translated strings, it would better to use Transifex directly.

EDIT: If you have any questions about using of Transifex website, don't hesitate to ask me about them.

Updated d348fb49ed1f71cf2013907958819b41796b2528 -> 69334a00a6b986c9b6be6257bcbd85df0c752b89 ([pr26141.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.01) -> [pr26141.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.02), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr26141.01..pr26141.02)):

- pulled the recent translations updates from the Transifex website

issue.title: Add german translation for "Restore Wallet..."
issue.body:
<!-- Describe the issue -->

Using the german locale, the file menu item "Restore Wallet..." is missing a translation.

<!--- What behavior did you expect? -->

Instead of "Restore Wallet..." I would expect the german translation "Wallet wiederherstellen..."

<!--- How reliably can you reproduce the issue, what are the steps to do so? -->

Windows 7, 64-bit, German 

<!-- What version of Bitcoin Core are you using, where did you get it (website, self-compiled, etc)? -->

bitcoin-24.0rc1-win64-setup.exe binary from bitcoincore.org/bin

events.body:
Updated 69334a00a6b986c9b6be6257bcbd85df0c752b89 -> efa4e3b71fa23d90974dca7c8b7b01eaa1600be2 ([pr26141.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.02) -> [pr26141.03](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.03), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr26141.02..pr26141.03)):

- pulled the recent translations updates from the Transifex website

Updated efa4e3b71fa23d90974dca7c8b7b01eaa1600be2 -> a0d5e395319f0cb1a299e6c7579ec7e886b30e17 ([pr26141.03](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.03) -> [pr26141.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.04), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr26141.03..pr26141.04)):

- pulled the recent translations updates from the Transifex website

Updated a0d5e395319f0cb1a299e6c7579ec7e886b30e17 -> d6dc3cb9d63a3595c3a76c0c8884c712ef6237ca ([pr26141.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.04) -> [pr26141.05](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr26141.05), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr26141.04..pr26141.05)):

- pulled the recent translations updates from the Transifex website
If there are any more changes can you pull them in here. Planning on merging this shortly.

qt: 24.0rc2 translations update

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -72,8 +72,8 @@
     <message>
         <source>These are your Bitcoin addresses for receiving payments. Use the 'Create new receiving address' button in the receive tab to create new addresses.
 Signing is only possible with addresses of the type 'legacy'.</source>
-        <translation type="unfinished">Ce sont vos adressesBitcoin pour recevoir des paiements. Utilisez le bouton Crer une nouvelle adresse de rception dans longlet Recevoir afin de crer de nouvelles adresses.
-Il nest possible de signer quavec les adresses de type legacy.</translation>
+        <translation type="unfinished">Il s'agit de vos adresses Bitcoin pour la rception des paiements. Utilisez le bouton "Crer une nouvelle adresse de rception" dans l'onglet "Recevoir" pour crer de nouvelles adresses.
+La signature n'est possible qu'avec les adresses de type "patrimoine".</translation>
comments.body: This chunk can be reverted. The previous translation was fine, and it even translated "legacy" in the inheritance sense. Seems like a poor automatic translation.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -247,15 +247,15 @@ Il nest possible de signer quavec les adresses de type legacy.</tr
     <name>BitcoinApplication</name>
     <message>
         <source>Runaway exception</source>
-        <translation type="unfinished">Exception fugitive</translation>
+        <translation type="unfinished">Exception excessive</translation>
comments.body:
Hahaha you guys must have fun reading translations in your own language too. Not sure we should try to translate those, but if we need to i guess keeping the original name would be more helpful.

> Exception "runaway"

-            <numerusform>%n seconde</numerusform>
-            <numerusform>%n secondes</numerusform>

comments.body: Don't know the rationale for these, but "%n secondes" is correct.

     </message>
     <message>

-        <translation type="unfinished">Cette erreur pourrait survenir si ce porte-monnaie navait pas t ferm proprement et sil avait t charg en dernier avec une nouvelle version de BerkeleyDB. Si cest le cas, veuillez utiliser le logiciel qui a charg ce porte-monnaie en dernier.</translation>
+        <translation type="unfinished">Cette erreur pourrait survenir si ce porte-monnaie na pas t ferm proprement et sil a t charg en dernier avec une nouvelle version de BerkeleyDB. Si cest le cas, veuillez utiliser le logiciel qui a charg ce porte-monnaie en dernier.</translation>

-        <translation type="unfinished">Ceci est une prversion de test - son utilisation est entirement  vos risques - ne pas lutiliser pour miner ou pour des applications marchandes</translation>

@@ -578,13 +578,17 @@ Il nest possible de signer quavec les adresses de type legacy.</tr
         <source>Unable to replay blocks. You will need to rebuild the database using -reindex-chainstate.</source>

     </message>

+        <translation type="unfinished">Le format de fichier porte-monnaie %s indiqu est inconnu. Veuillez soit indiquer bdb soit sqlite.</translation>
comments.body:
nit

```suggestion
        <translation type="unfinished">Le format de fichier porte-monnaie %s indiqu est inconnu. Veuillez indiquer soit bdb soit sqlite.</translation>
```
